-----Original Message-----

To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3250009O] Jaanhost.com Abuse

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Jaanhost.com Abuse
Added by system at Tuesday, Feb 27 2007 01:09 am

<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Tue Feb 27 01:04:34 2007

        id 1HLwNi-000HUv-UW 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 27 Feb 2007 01:04:14 -0600

Received: from 64.4.61.244 by by102fd.bay102.hotmail.msn.com with HTTP; 
        Tue, 27 Feb 2007 07:03:49 GMT

X-Originating-Email: [darkx3@hotmail.com]

From: "Xoopie [X]" <darkx3@hotmail.com> 
To: abuse@theplanet.com 
Bcc:  
Subject: Jaanhost.com Abuse 
Date: Tue, 27 Feb 2007 07:03:49 +0000 
Mime-Version: 1.0 
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 27 Feb 2007 07:03:50.0400 (UTC) FILETIME=[6EEED800:01C75A3D] 
Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of hotmail.com designates
65.54.246.86 as permitted sender) client-ip=65.54.246.86;
envelope-from=darkx3@hotmail.com; helo=bay0-omc1-s14.bay0.hotmail.com; 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Echostar: Cricket World Cup Series 2007 infringments- EchoStar_NRID49344 
 
NetResult Internal Reference: EchoStar_NRID49344 
 
Please quote the above EchoStar_NRID49344 reference in all communications  
with us regarding this issue. 
 
 
Dear Sirs, 
 
 
We write on behalf of EchoStar Satellite L.L.C. ("EchoStar") the exclusive  
broadband/Internet rights holder for USA, Mexico, Canada and the Caribbean  
for the 2006 India vs. West Indies Cricket Tour (the "Series"). 
We have noticed that your website, http://jaanfx.com/cricket/  is displaying  
Audio Visual (A/V) content from the above Series. As you are aware, you've  
engaged in such display without obtaining authority or authorization from  
EchoStar to do so. 
 
Please be advised that your unauthorized use of EchoStar's intellectual  
property constitutes an infringement of EchoStar's exclusive copyrights.  
Please immediately cease all such infringing activities on any and all of  
your web sites (and elsewhere) and confirm to us via email that you have  
done so. 
 
Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an  
express or implied waiver of any of EchoStar's rights or remedies, all of  
which are expressly reserved. 
 
Formal Declaration 
 
I hereby state that EchoStar is the sole owner of the rights referenced  
above and that NetResult is authorized to act on its behalf with respect to  
internet monitoring and compliance. 
 
On behalf of the owner of the exclusive rights with respect to the content  
at issue in this notice, I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that  
use of such A/V in the manner complained of is not authorized by the owner,  
its agent, or the law. 
 
I, Mike Kiernan, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign this  
e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States  
of America with the additional statement under penalty of perjury that the  
information in the notice is accurate. 
 
We thank you for your cooperation. 
 
Yours sincerely, 
 
 
Mike Kiernan 
 
NetResult 
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd 
Mulberry House 
583 Fulham Road 
London 
UK SW6 5UA 
Tel: 0207 471 1730 
 
Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please  
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail  
immediately to the correct person or department for action. 
 
_________________________________________________________________ 
Win a Zune
